Layers can be pruned during inference" description: "Implements Layerdrop for regularization and minimize computational steps. Layers can be pruned during inference" ---

class Layerdrop[source]

Layerdrop(module_list, layers_to_drop) :: Module

Implements [Reducing Transformer Depth on Demand with Structured Dropout] (https://arxiv.org/abs/1909.11556)

Arguments: module_list (nn.ModuleList): List from which layers are to dropped. layers_to_drop (int): number of layers to drop

Returns: feats: pruned features

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Layerdrop_Cross[source]

Layerdrop_Cross(module_list, layers_to_drop=2) :: Module

This method is useful when layerdrop has to be used in multi modal settings (visual and linguistic) features

Returns: lang_feats, visn_feats: pruned features for language and vision modality
